projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Green Hydrogen Projects & Product Development- Process Design
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Green Hydrogen Projects & Product Development- Process Design

Description: Support the Green Hydrogen solutions team on process design and application of system and it's components during design, manufacturing and implementation of various projects.

Skill sets: P&ID, Thermodynamics, Fluid Flow, Heat & Mass Balance

Traits expectation: Application of process design concepts, Component selection based on desired

specifications, Technical detailing, Timely delivery of tasks

Expected learning: Designing & Selection of components of a system, Detail Engineering, Project Management

Specific courses required for project execution: Thermodynamics, Control Systems, Fluid Dynamics

projectGridLines.title: Project 2  Title: Green Hydrogen Projects & Product Development- Control & Instrumentation
projectGridLines.description:
Project 2

Title: Green Hydrogen Projects & Product Development- Control & Instrumentation

Description: Support the Green Hydrogen solutions team on C&I design and application of system

and it's components during design, manufacturing and implementation of various projects.

Skill sets: P&ID, Cause & Effect, System architecture design, Instrument selection, SIL study

Traits expectation: Innovative ability for Designing of Control philosophy and working on the optimized solutions, Application of process design concepts, Component selection based on desired specifications, Technical detailing, Timely delivery of tasks

Expected learning: Designing &Selection of components of a system, Detail Engineering, Project Management

Specific courses required for project execution: As required for above

projectGridLines.title: Project 3  Title: Green Hydrogen Projects-Project Management
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Support the Project Management team on the overall lifecycle of projects under implementation including Engineering, Procurement, Installation and Commissioning of the systems.

Skill sets: P&ID, Planning, Cost Analysis, Stakeholder Management

Traits expectation: Application Engineering, Micro Planning & scheduling of tasks, Strong Written & Oral communication

Expected learning: Project Management, Understanding of overall system, Planning, Stakeholder Management

Specific courses required for project execution: As required for above
